title: Correct Way to Make Fractions?
content:
The book I'm typesetting right now has numerous fractions, and I was wondering if I could get advice on the best way to create them. I don't have _Elements of Typographic Style_ handy at the moment.   
   
1. I know enough to use the fraction-slash (I forget the correct name)   
   
2. What percentage of the full point size can I make the numerator and denominator without them looking too light?   
   
3. Should it be flush with the baseline, or can lowercase numerals (like 3) hang below?   
   
Paul
author: capthaddock
